headers.subject: [tosdr:2680] [good] jobvite.com promises to send email notice of privacy policy changes

html:
Jobvite reserves the right to change this Privacy Policy from time to time. Jobvite will post the revised Privacy Policy on this Site located at http://www.jobvite.com/Recruiting/PrivacyPolicy.aspx and will either send a notice to the e-mail address that you specified in your registration and/or post notice of the change so it is visible when users log-on for the first time prior to said changes taking effect so that you are always aware of what personal information Jobvite may collect and how Jobvite may use this information. - See more at: http://recruiting.jobvite.com/privacy-policy.php#sthash.6qF7XB0D.dpuf

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/groups/opt_out.
subject: [good] jobvite.com promises to send email notice of privacy policy changes
text:
Jobvite reserves the right to change this Privacy Policy from time to time. 
Jobvite will post the revised Privacy Policy on this Site located at 
http://www.jobvite.com/Recruiting/PrivacyPolicy.aspx and will either send a 
notice to the e-mail address that you specified in your registration and/or 
post notice of the change so it is visible when users log-on for the first 
time prior to said changes taking effect so that you are always aware of 
what personal information Jobvite may collect and how Jobvite may use this 
information. - See more at: 
http://recruiting.jobvite.com/privacy-policy.php#sthash.6qF7XB0D.dpuf

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
